issues.description: Missing return statement after error annotation. If there's an error in detecting the archive type, the function will continue execution instead of returning the error.
Silent error handling in Tar method. If safeJoin returns an error (path traversal attempt), the function just continues to the next iteration without logging or handling the error properly.
Similar silent error handling in Zip method. If safeJoin returns an error, the function continues without proper error handling.
Inconsistent error wrapping. Line 267 uses %w format which properly wraps errors (Go 1.13+), but line 263 uses %s which doesn't properly wrap the error.
Unchecked error from file.Close() in Zip method, which could lead to resource leaks.
Another unchecked error from file.Close() in Zip method.
Silent ignore of error from e.FS.Remove(path) in copy method.
Silent ignore of error from e.FS.Remove in Tar method.
Another silent ignore of error from e.FS.Remove in Tar method.
Silent ignore of error from e.FS.Remove in Zip method.
